data.actual_result: The highlight leeks out of the top and the left side.
data.expected_result: The highlight either runs out of all the sides of tab/button or doesn't move out at all.
data.short_description: On the applications page of the Developers portal, when you long press on "Create An Application", the blue highlight moves out of the bounds of the box. (Mobile only I guess)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open https(colon)//discordapp(dot)com/developers/applications . - Scroll down to the bottom. - Click on "Create An Application" (or long press it to see the highlight for a longer time).
